name: Retrowave Rider
description:
Drive forward onto the neon-lit road.
You will conquer the path before you. Use color-switching powers to reshape the levels to your advantage.

  • Hand-crafted level design
  • A unique mix of runner and puzzle that will keep you on your toes
  • Extra collectibles that unlock customization options for your rider
  • Accessibility support for colorblindness and for people with slower reaction times

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2013720/Retrowave_Rider
